abstract: Lee Dong-Gook (Hangul: 이동국) (born 29 April 1979) is a South Korean association football striker who currently plays for Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors. He is the record scorer in the K-League, and had brief spells in Europe with Werder Bremen and Middlesbrough.Lee has earned 99 international caps for South Korea since 1998, scoring 30 goals. He has played at two FIFA World Cups, two CONCACAF Gold Cups, two AFC Asian Cups and the 2000 Olympics.
